title: Santa Fe Vintage Auto Showcase
description: Join us for the annual Santa Fe Vintage Auto Showcase featuring over 100 classic vehicles from across the Southwest. Food vendors, live music, and awards ceremony.

title: Route 66 Classic Cruise
description: Cruise down historic Route 66 with fellow classic car enthusiasts. This monthly event includes a group drive and ends with a meetup at Old Town Albuquerque.

title: White Sands Desert Drive
description: Experience a breathtaking drive through White Sands National Park. This photoshoot event will capture your classic car against the stunning white sand dunes.

title: Taos Mountain Classic Car Rally
description: A full day of classic car appreciation in beautiful Taos. Mountain drive in the morning, followed by a show and shine event at Taos Plaza.

title: Roswell Cosmic Cruise
description: A unique nighttime cruise event with an alien theme. Classic cars, cosmic decorations, and special awards for the most creative vehicles.

title: Las Vegas Vintage Grand Prix
location: Storrie Lake State Park, Las Vegas, NM
description: A day of classic car racing and exhibitions around scenic Storrie Lake. Spectator areas, food trucks, and a classic car corral for attendees who bring their own vintage vehicles.
